testcase.classname: Choose a username that can contain any chars, but it cannot be blank
testcase.name: test username for new applicant
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to webpage..................................................passed When user navigates to registration page....................................passed And user verifies Registration is displayed.................................passed And user provides ssn id as "888-33-4535"...................................passed And user provides firstname as "Ali"........................................passed And user provides lastname as "Can".........................................passed And user provides username as "user19051"...................................passed And user provides email as "alican12905@gmail.com"..........................passed When user types password as "1234"..........................................passed And user types password confirmation as "1234"..............................passed And user clicks on Register button..........................................passed Then user should see Registration saved message.............................passed And user closes the browser.................................................passed
